dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: A widely used dataset in continual learning, containing 100 classes, with each class having 500 training and 100 test images.
dcterms:title: Split CIFAR-100

dcterms:description: ImageNet-R is formed from 200 subcategories of ImageNet but with images from different domains such as cartoon, graffiti, and origami. It includes hard examples from ImageNet that standard models fail to classify.
dcterms:title: Split ImageNet-R

dcterms:creator: C. Wah
S. Branson
P. Welinder
P. Perona
S. Belongie
dcterms:description: CUB-200 is a fine-grained dataset containing 200 classes of different bird species with 5994 training images and 5794 test images.
dcterms:title: Split CUB-200
